thread.title: Manchester City stars can't wait to get Gabriel Jesus in the team after seeing his first training session
thread.title_full: Manchester City stars can't wait to get Gabriel Jesus in the team after seeing his first training session

author: David Maddock
title: Manchester City stars can't wait to get Gabriel Jesus in the team after seeing his first training session
text:
Sport Manchester City stars can't wait to get Gabriel Jesus in the team after seeing his first training session Brazilian forward signed for £27m last summer has now joined up with the Blues — and impressed Gael Clichy and co Share Highly-rated Gabriel Jesus arrived in Manchester on Tuesday (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) Share Get     
Samba star Gabriel Jesus is set to take the Premier League by storm. 
That is the view of new Manchester City team-mate Gael Clichy, who is confident the forward dubbed Brazil’s next great will make an instant impact after finally arriving at the Etihad. 
Jesus comes not just with a massive reputation , but a massive price-tag — City splashed out a cool £27m last summer on one of the most wanted young players in world football. 
He has been on loan at former club Palmeiras, but finally trained with his new team-mates on Wednesday. 
Boss Pep Guardiola is warning the teenager may need a couple of weeks of ‘pre-season’ after a month off but with the Blues’ title hopes receding fast, Clichy revealed the players are determined to help the 19-year-old hit the ground running. 
“When a team like City brings in a player he is a quality player, so it’s always good to have someone coming in – fresh legs and a new body,” said the French defender, after watching Jesus in training. Out to eat with boss Guardiola, countrymen Fernandinho and Fernando and director of football Txiki Begiristain (Photo: Twitter/@ManCity) 
“I know he is really good. I’ve spoken to the Brazilian players – and a player from Brazil being bought by City is sure to have quality. 
“He will need time to adjust but I hope he can be that good and make an impact as soon as possible. We will help him to get to his full potential as soon as possible, because in football people want results. 
“It’s an exciting moment for him, for us and for the fans and we hope he can score many goals.”
